articles.title: New disease breaking out in China
articles.description: A new, highly contagious disease has been discovered in Wuhan, China.

articles.title: The Chinese virus affects the lungs
articles.description: The newly discovered Chinese virus causes troubled breathing and coughing.

articles.title: Wuhan disease caused by new variant of known virus
articles.description: Wuhan's quickly spreading disease is discovered to be caused by a new variant of the Coronavirus.

articles.title: Wuhan under massive lockdown
articles.description: Wuhan citizens are physically barred from leaving their homes, in an attempt to halt the spread of disease.

articles.title: Mass graves in Wuhan
articles.description: Wuhan must resort to the use of mass graves to handle the growing number victims.

articles.title: Virus mostly affects old and immunocompromised
articles.description: Most victims of the Chinese virus is reported to be old or sick. Younger people have nothinng to fear.

articles.title: First victum of the Wuhan virus confirmed outside China
articles.description: The Wuhan-originating virus may soon become an epidemic, as the first person outside China has caught the disease.

articles.title: Italian hospitals under heavy stress
articles.description: Italian hospitals are struggling to treat all Coronavirus patients.

articles.title: Italy resorts to quarantine
articles.description: In an attempt to spare the overcrowded hospitals, Italy resorts to nationwide lockdown.

articles.title: Dead bodies filling the halls of Italian hospitals
articles.description: Italian hospitals do not have the capaity to properly handle the growing number of Coronavirus victims, as corpses lay in the halls covered by coats and blankets.

articles.title: Young Italian doctors are dying
articles.description: Despite the Coronavirus mostly affecting the older population, young doctors are dying from the disease due to extended exposure.

articles.title: Coronavirus situation officially considered epidemic
articles.description: The quickly spreading disease is officially considered an epidemic by the WHO.

articles.title: Many countries entering quarantine
articles.description: Several countries has deemed it necessary to enter a lockdown to combat the diesease.

articles.title: Sweden refuses quarantine
articles.description: Despite how their neighbors are handling the sitaution, Sweden will not lock down the country.

articles.title: Sweden still refusing lockdown
articles.description: The streets of Stockholm are filled with people enjoying their coffee while disease rages on.

articles.title: Coronavirus may have lasting effects on the body
articles.description: Multiple people reporting shortness of breath and brain fog several months after contracting the virus.
